title: Nutragentex Review
author: Andrew (Editor)

organizations.name: nutragentex review diet reviews / bodybuilding reviews / testosterone boosters / nutragentex review

text:
Diet Reviews / Bodybuilding Reviews / Testosterone Boosters / Nutragentex Review 
If testosterone levels decrease with age, can Nutragentex help? We delved into the ingredients, side effects, and scientific research. Furthermore, we read tons of product testimonials. Then, we condensed all of the information we found to give you all the facts for the bottom line. Nutragentex Readers:   Pronabolin. What is Nutragentex? 
First of all, Nutragentex is an over-the-counter supplement aimed at boosting testosterone or relieving symptoms of low T. The website doesn’t list the ingredients. There are 30 capsules in each bottle, which might be enough for a month. The supplement claims to be 100% natural, which is a positive to us. 
Although we are not sure of the company behind Nutragentex, we do know that the website was created in 2013. This is also the only place one can buy the supplement. They have a satisfaction guarantee and promises real results, but read on… A jump-start for testosterone production or another hoax? Poor Customer Service – “Can You Reach Nutragentex?” 
The first problem we found in Nutragentex reviews was an issue with their customer service. “An important aspect of any company is their customer service,” said our Research Editor. “If a supplement is accompanied by poor customer service, individuals will quickly stop buying it.” 
On the website, it says, “For all inquiries including refunds, trials, [and] cancellations [of] your order before the end of the trial period, please email or call.” 
The website claims that their customer service is available on weekdays from 8:30 AM – 5:00 PM. However, many customers had problems getting in contact with an individual at the company. 
“Called the number on the invoice to cancel, and waited over an hour to connect…then they started calling me regularly,” one person reviewed. 
Another individual had the same problem, “…you cannot reach a live person at any of their phone numbers to cancel ‘subscription.’” Scroll   Free Trial Offer – “What’s the Real Price?” 
The second issue we found with Nutragentex is their trial offer. According to the website, “…you will be charged $9.99 today for shipping and handling of Nutragentex.” 
They went on to say, “If the order is not canceled before the end of the trial period…you will be charged $69.95…until canceled.” However, many customers have claimed to be charged more than this before their trial period has ended. 
One review mentioned, “…A company that has the…integrity to hide the terms of their “free trial offer” is not trustworthy…” 
“Just be careful of credit card charges exceeding $126.99,” another said. 
After acquiring years of experience with diet products, we have found that is can take something small to cut the chance of long-term results. If Nutragentex does have poor customer service and a problematic “free” trial offer, then that could be a significant issue. The Science – “Are Scientific Claims Accurate?” 
Nutragentex claims to be a “scientifically advanced post-workout pill” that can increase metabolism, endurance threshold, energy levels, and protein synthesis while reducing body fat percentage and recovery time. However, the supplement does not cite any research to back up these claims. Additionally, without knowing the ingredients in the product, we cannot be sure if it is safe for consumption.   Nutragentex Work? 
So, is Nutragentex a supplement worth your money? Well, we do like that the product has a satisfaction guarantee and is 100% natural, but we have some concerns about backing it. It seems like the free trial offer, and customer service has caused many of their customer’s problems. 
If you want to lose weight, we think you should try a supplement that has an effective trial offer and a supportive customer service department. 
  we’ve seen this year is one called Pronabolin . It contains a proprietary blend of clinically researched ingredients that can help increase endurance, stamina and testosterone levels. Multiple-bottle discounts and a 120-day money-back guarantee for new customers is available. Learn More About Pronabolin   A jump-start for testosterone production or another hoax?
